content: empower people tunisian crochet bandana call to action we will not stand on the sidelines in 2020 and beyond we are at a pivotal moment in our country and we need to be actively engaged in politics we will stand united and ready to fight for our rights and the rights of others we will vote november 3rd knit crochet or sew the empower people bandana & wear it proudly while… speaking against injustice attending gatherings marching voting for additional information knit crochet and sewing patterns visit https //empowerpeople2020 com please do not claim any part of this pattern as your own you may link to this pattern but please do not reprint it or post electronically to any source do not sell the pattern or distribute it you may sell products made from this pattern but please clearly credit the designer detroit knots and provide a link to my pages here permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind thank you notes this bandana can be worn many ways a kerchief bandana or headwrap all row have a standard return pass unless otherwise noted the pattern is written to fit a standard head size of 18- 21 in after blocking to adjust size repeat row 4 and 5 to desired length keep in mind yardage when adjusting gauge 18 tss x 16 row = 4 in blocked materials tunisian crochet hook j 6 0 mm or hook to obtain gauge with 12 in cord yarn needle tape measure sample queenie s crochet dk in aubergine 218 yards/ 200 meters/ 100 grams yarn any purple dk weight yardage 109 yards/ 99 66 meters/50 grams abbreviations chain= chain s retp = return pass m1= make one increase st s = stitch es rem = remain ing tss= tunisian simple stitch repeat= repeat special stitches make one increase m1 - increase one stich by inserting your hook in the back bump of the previous return chain pull up a loop see photo on last page please do not claim any part of this pattern as your own you may link to this pattern but please do not reprint it or post electronically to any source do not sell the pattern or distribute it you may sell products made from this pattern but please clearly credit the designer detroit knots and provide a link to my pages here permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind thank you instructions row 1 chain 6 pull up a loop in the 2nd chain and in each rem chain row 2-3 tss all sts row 4 tss1 m1 2 times tss rem sts row 5 tss all sts repeat row 4 and 5 until piece reaches 17 in along the diagonal edge repeat row 5 three more times bind off all sts cut the yarn leave a long enough tail to seam finishing wet block to measurement before seaming using the mattress stitch seam at edges
